queries.query: SELECT OBJECT_NAME(i.[object_id]) AS [ObjectName] ,i.[index_id] AS [IndexID] ,i.[name] AS [IndexName] ,i.[type_desc] AS [IndexType] ,p.partition_number ,p.data_compression_desc FROM [sys].[indexes] i JOIN sys.partitions p ON i.object_id = p.object_id AND i.index_id = p.index_id WHERE p.data_compression_desc <> 'NONE' ORDER BY OBJECT_NAME(i.[object_id]);
